${ModID}:Shelling.NAME: Shelling
${ModID}:Shelling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, and !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random other enemy. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell.

${ModID}:Suppress.NAME: Suppress
${ModID}:Suppress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! *Weak. Target loses 3 Strength this turn.

${ModID}:BallisticStrike.NAME: Ballistic Strike
${ModID}:BallisticStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage. Double damage if the enemy is attacking. NL Gain !M! *Shellings that cost 0 and *Exhaust.
${ModID}:BallisticStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage. Double damage if the enemy is attacking. NL Gain !M! *Shellings+ that cost 0 and *Exhaust.

${ModID}:DefensePlanning.NAME: Defense Planning
${ModID}:DefensePlanning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you don't have ${ModID}:Blur, gain 1 ${ModID}:Blur.

${ModID}:Logistics.NAME: Logistics
${ModID}:Logistics.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell. NL Draw 1 card.
${ModID}:Logistics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell. NL Draw !anniv5:m2! cards.
${ModID}:Logistics.FLAVOR: They really make everything run smoother.

${ModID}:ThinkTwice.NAME: Think Twice
${ModID}:ThinkTwice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block for each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Shrapnel.NAME: Shrapnel
${ModID}:Shrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Your hits apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.
${ModID}:Shrapnel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Your hits apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ignited creatures lose #b1 HP per stack at the start of their turn.

${ModID}:ShellForge.NAME: Shell Forge
${ModID}:ShellForge.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Shells provide an additional !M! damage. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 ${ModID}:Shell.
${ModID}:ShellForge.FLAVOR: Like a bakery but for explosives.

${ModID}:DigIn.NAME: Dig In
${ModID}:DigIn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${ModID}:Blur. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] if you have any Block left.
${ModID}:DigIn.FLAVOR: Looks like a nice spot to set up camp.

${ModID}:Prevail.NAME: Prevail
${ModID}:Prevail.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal at least 9 damage in a single hit, the enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
